<Animate(Rodney, looking_down)>

<Animate(Rodney, looking_down)>

doc.name: Bella
doc.bio:
Bella is a 24-year-old pianist and Rodney’s best friend whom she met in foster care.

She’s a tall curvy woman with caramel hair and brown eyes who makes a living playing the piano at a local jazz bar.

She doesn’t make much money but it’s enough to keep them both fed.

Bella scouts out the rich clientele from the bar so Rodney can follow them and do his job.

Bella and Rodney share a close relationship ever since he stole a piano to impress her.

She’s charming, funny and wants to make it big in the music world.
doc.properties:
name: BELLE
age: 24
gender: Female
hair: caramel
eyes: brown
body: tall and curvy
ocupation: jazz pianist

doc.name: 03 - Ending
doc.content:
Story


One day Bella comes home to Rodney, her best friend who’s also a sneaky thief. She tells him about a woman named Camille who came to the bar she works at and seemed to possess a lot of riches, implying it would be beneficial for them to rob her.


If Rodney accepts: Together they plan the heist that could pay for Bella’s application into musical school and give them a more comfortable life since they live in an abandoned building in New Orleans. When Rodney is able to get inside the house (either in the morning or at night depending on the players choice) he finds a safe while exploring, thinking he hit the jackpot he looks around the house for the code. When he finally finds it the only thing he sees is a small bullet with strange markings that seems to fit inside his gun. Camille catches him in the act and piecing things together, she knows she can’t let him leave with the bullet so she launches at him. Surprised, Rodney accidentally shoots her and just like that she vanishes without a trace, along with all the stuff inside her house. Rodney just sits in the floor in disbelief, not only because he shot someone but because of their sudden disappearance. He runs home to Bella who doesn’t understand what he’s saying since they never talked about any heist but she trusts him with her life. Rodney knows what he saw and they start a journey to figure out more about the mysterious disappearance of Camille, her past and the side effects of The Bullet.


If Rodney declines: Together they plan the heist that could pay for Bella’s application into musical school and give them a more comfortable life since they live in an abandoned building in New Orleans. When Bella is able to get inside the house (either in the morning or at night depending on the players choice) she finds a safe while exploring, thinking she hit the jackpot she looks around the house for the code. When she finally finds it the only thing she sees is a small bullet with strange markings that seems to fit inside Rodney’s gun. Camille catches her in the act and piecing things together, she knows she can’t let her leave with the bullet so she launches at her. Surprised, Bella accidentally shoots her and just like that she vanishes without a trace, along with all the stuff inside her house. Bella just sits in the floor crying and in disbelief, not only because she shot someone but because of their sudden disappearance. She runs home to Rodney who comforts her and after much consideration, they start a journey to figure out more about the mysterious disappearance of Camille, her past and the side effects of The Bullet.


Ending: In the end they find out that Rodney didn’t forget about Camille’s existence because she is his mom and The Bullet can’t affect the children of the erased. She gave him up for adoption as a child because she didn’t want to burden him with the responsibilities of owning The Bullet, which is passed down from generation to generation.

doc.name: 02 - Main Characters
doc.content:
Main Characters


Rodney is a 25-year-old thief who steals to survive. He’s a short skinny man with black hair and silver eyes who’s often overlooked, but he doesn’t mind since it makes his job easier.

Rodney lives in an abandoned building in New Orleans with Bella whom he met in foster care. Living in poverty for most of his life has led him to be practical, quick on his feet, and even though envious of rich people, still empathetic.


Bella is a 24-year-old pianist and Rodney’s best friend whom she met in foster care. She’s a tall curvy woman with caramel hair and brown eyes who makes a living playing the piano at a local jazz bar. She doesn’t make much money but it’s enough to keep them both fed. Bella scouts out the rich clientele from the bar so Rodney can follow them and do his job. Bella and Rodney share a close relationship ever since he stole a piano to impress her. She’s charming, funny and wants to make it big in the music world.


Camille is a 72-year-old widow and the last carrier of The Bullet. She’s a short chubby woman

with white hair and hazel eyes. She lives alone in her big house with only the ghosts of her past

to keep her company. She’s melancholic and wise.

doc.name: Rodney helps Bella
doc.content: // Created on : Mon Mar 22 2021 00:33:52 GMT-0300 (Argentina Standard Time)
doc.path: Dialogues.01 - Plan the heist.Rodney helps Bella

doc.name: Rodney Declines
doc.content:
// Bella arrives home

<FadeIn()>
<CutTo(home)>

// Bella rushes home from her job as a pianist at a local jazz bar. Still catching her breath
<Animate(bella, enterHome)>

::Bella:: Rodney!
::Rodney:: Bella welcome back to our humble abode. What do you want for dinner? Bread with butter- 

// Bella interrupts Rodney
::Bella:: Or butter with bread? Yes, very funny.
::Rodney:: I was actually going to say... That's exactly what I was going to say.
::Bella:: I know you so well. But I have great news! [excited]
::Rodney:: I'm listening.
::Bella:: We hit the jackpot! I saw this old woman today at the bar while I was on my break and not only did she order the most expensive drink she tipped me and the bartender!I bet there's a lot of money where this bill came from.

// Bella flaunts the 50$ the woman tipped her
<Animate(bella, show_tip)>

// Rodney ponders
<Animate(rodney,ponder)>

// As Rodney lies down in his hard run down mattress the idea starts to become very appetizing for him, although he can't help but wonder if it's a step too far.) 
::Rodney:: Rodney ponders

// As Rodney lies down in his hard run down mattress the idea starts to become very appetizing for him, although he can't help but wonder if it's a step too far.)
::Rodney:: I know how bad Bella wants to get into music school but stealing from old people is usually off limits for us. Who am I to grow a conscience right now though? [worried]

// Rodney drifts away into sleep
<Animate(rodney,sleep)>
<FadeOut()>
<Wait(5)>
<CutTo(bedroom)>
<LocateActor(rodney, bedroom)>
<LocateActor(bella, bedroom)>
<Animate(rodney, wake_on_bed)>
<Animate(bella, sit_on_bed)>
<FadeIn()>

// Rodney wakes up and scans the room to find Bella already awake staring at him with a smile.
::Bella:: Well?
::Rodney:: Well what?
::Bella:: Are we going to do it?
::Rodney:: We? Who's we? I always have to do the dirty work.
::Bella:: Hey, that's not fair, I always do thescouting AND planning.
::Rodney:: Yes misses "No, they don't have a dog".
::Bella:: You're never going to let me live that down are you?

// Rodney shakes his head no and laughs
<Animate(rodney, shake_head)>
<Animate(rodney, laugh_out_loud)>

::Bella:: So, what's it going to be?

You can edit here, the script:

doc.name: 01 - Overview
doc.content:
Game Concept


A thief named Rodney plans a heist alongside his best friend Bella in order to rob Camille, an elderly woman, but when she fights back Rodney makes the mistake of shooting her with a bullet he found in her safe at her house. She disappears alongside with all her belongings.

Rodney’s journey starts as he tries to figure out more about Camille and her past but no one seems to remember her, it’s almost like she never even existed. Rumor says, it was a bullet capable of erasing someone's existence.

doc.name: The Bullet
doc.content: Created on : Sun Mar 21 2021 23:50:00 GMT-0300 (Argentina Standard Time)
doc.properties:
Name: The Bullet
Description: An extraordinary piece of ammunition that’s capable of erasing any trace of  someone’s existence. It doesn’t erased the memory of the person who’s shooting nor the children of the victim
